New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 53 runs off 28 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 7 runs
Key Match Events: Afghanistan lost key players early in the powerplay
Gulbadin Naib and Azmatullah Omarzai had a 44-run stand
Afghanistan's wickets fell in successive overs
Arshdeep Singh took the last three wickets
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the toss and decided to bat first
Virat Kohli and Rishabh Pant scored entertaining knocks
Suryakumar Yadav used sweeps effectively against Afghan spinners
Post-Match Reflections: Rashid Khan and Farooqi were praised for their performances
India looked forward to upcoming matches against Bangladesh and Australia
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the Super 8 stage of the T20 World Cup
The outcome was crucial for both teams' tournament progress
